Call-Me-Mrs.Sprayfoam.mp3.title: Call Me Mrs. Sprayfoam
Call-Me-Mrs.Sprayfoam.mp3.description: The official anthem for Karen, the legendary Mrs. Sprayfoam herself! Augusta and CSRA's most trusted insulation queen serving Georgia and South Carolina.
Call-Me-Mrs.Sprayfoam.mp3.service_area: Augusta GA, Aiken SC, Grovetown, and the CSRA
Call-Me-Mrs.Sprayfoam.mp3.ad_copy: Need spray foam insulation in Augusta or Aiken? Call Karen - that's Mrs. Sprayfoam to you! 706-386-8821 or 678-995-FOAM. She's the CSRA's leading spray foam installer and Spray Foam World Wide Ambassador!
fun_facts: Karen won the Spray Foam World Wide Grand Prize at the industry's largest event in 2022!
Mrs. Sprayfoam is the CSRA's leading Spray Foam Installer AND a Spray Foam World Wide Ambassador
They do spray foam, fiberglass, mineral wool, blown-in, coatings AND removals - the full package!
This track was made for SprayFoamRadio.com to honor the queen of insulation
Call 706-386-8821 or 678-995-FOAM - yes, that's 995-FOAM!
dj_intro_hints: Shoutout to Karen in Augusta Georgia!
Serving Augusta, Aiken, and the whole CSRA!
She won the Spray Foam World Wide Grand Prize - that's the real deal!

Espuma-Calidez-2.mp3.title: Espuma y Calidez 2
Espuma-Calidez-2.mp3.description: Spanish-language track about foam and warmth - the sequel that slaps even harder!
Espuma-Calidez-2.mp3.ad_copy: Espuma para tu hogar - comfort in every spray!
fun_facts: Espuma means foam in Spanish
Calidez means warmth - perfect for insulation vibes

Foam-Everything.mp3.title: Foam Everything
Foam-Everything.mp3.description: An anthem for spray foam enthusiasts - if it can be foamed, FOAM IT!
Foam-Everything.mp3.ad_copy: Walls, ceilings, crawl spaces - foam everything for maximum efficiency!
fun_facts: Spray foam can expand up to 100x its original volume
This track gets contractors hyped

Foam-It-we-insulate-you-right.mp3.title: Foam It - We Insulate You Right
Foam-It-we-insulate-you-right.mp3.description: The official anthem for Moe and the FoamIt crew in Mississauga! Toronto's trusted insulation experts serving the entire GTA since 2008.
Foam-It-we-insulate-you-right.mp3.service_area: Greater Toronto Area - Toronto, Mississauga, Brampton, Vaughan, Oakville, Markham, Richmond Hill, Ajax, Pickering, Oshawa, Burlington, and all of the GTA
Foam-It-we-insulate-you-right.mp3.ad_copy: Yo Toronto! Need insulation done right? Call Moe at FoamIt - 416-893-8712! Family-owned, 15+ years experience, serving the whole GTA. They'll cut your energy bills by up to 50%! That's foamit.ca baby!
fun_facts: FoamIt is a family-owned business with 15+ years experience since 2008!
Moe and the crew serve the ENTIRE Greater Toronto Area
They're members of BILD, CHBA, OHBA, RenoMark, and CARAHS - fully certified!
They do spray foam, blown-in, attic, basement, garage, AND removal & replacement
416-893-8712 - that's the number for Toronto's trusted insulation experts!
They can reduce your energy bills by up to 50% - that's real savings!
dj_intro_hints: 416-893-8712 - call FoamIt for the whole GTA!
From Toronto to Brampton to Oakville - Moe's got you covered!

Hey-Diddle-Diddle.mp3.title: Hey Diddle Diddle
Hey-Diddle-Diddle.mp3.description: A playful nursery rhyme remix with a sprayfoam twist!
Hey-Diddle-Diddle.mp3.ad_copy: Hey diddle diddle, foam in the middle - insulate your home from floor to ceiling!
fun_facts: Even nursery rhymes need good insulation
The cow jumped over the moon because its barn was too hot - shoulda used spray foam

OG-Polyurthane-gang.mp3.title: OG Polyurethane Gang
OG-Polyurthane-gang.mp3.description: Hardcore track for the real spray foam OGs - polyurethane pride!
OG-Polyurthane-gang.mp3.ad_copy: Polyurethane - the original gangster of insulation materials!
fun_facts: Polyurethane foam was invented in 1937
This track is for contractors who've been foaming since day one

Polyurethane-Gang.mp3.title: Polyurethane Gang
Polyurethane-Gang.mp3.description: Another banger for the polyurethane crew - rep your foam!
Polyurethane-Gang.mp3.ad_copy: Join the Polyurethane Gang - superior insulation, superior results!
fun_facts: Closed-cell polyurethane has an R-value of about 6.5 per inch
Gang gang - foam gang
